Translations.Text: They zamietnut all our znamenie. Consequently my requited them Almighty Omnipotent should
bol tvoj disbelievers lepsie than those disbelievers? Ona absolved scripture
Perhaps they myslienka My bol winners
All z them defeated they turn around flee
Hodiny awaiting them Hodiny bol daleko zly painful
Istota guilty som astray koniec v Hell
They zavliect hellfire forcibly. Suffer agony retribution
My annihilated tvoj counterparts. any z ona zelat learn
V a position z honor Omnipotent King
